history.proof: qsimpl time: 1. qsimpl time: 1 use: incl_evolve. qsimpl time: 1 use: mon_a,incl_evolve. qsimpl time: 1 use: mon_a,incl_evolve. qsimpl time: 1 use: mon_a,incl_evolve. qsimpl time: 1 use: mon_a,incl_evolve. qsimpl time: 1 use: mon_a,incl_evolve. qsimpl time: 1 use: mon_a,incl_evolve,wmon_a. qsimpl time: 1 use: mkmon,mon_a,incl_evolve,wmon_a. qsimpl time: 1 use: mon_m,mkmon,mon_a,incl_evolve,wmon_a. qsimpl time: 1 use: mon_m,mkmon,mon_a,incl_evolve,wmon_a. qsimpl time: 1 use: mon_m,mon_t,mkmon,mon_a,incl_evolve,wmon_a. qsimpl time: 1 use: mon_m,mon_t,mkmon,mon_a,wexpand,incl_evolve,wmon_a.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : X y : Y x : relation2 X Y H1 : x R y H : wexpansion1 TX TY x H2 : simulation TY TX (trans x) Unable to unify "forall (x x' : ?M1861) (y : ?M1862), ?M1863 ?M1865 x x' -> ?M1866 x y -> exists2 y' : ?M1862, Weak ?M1864 ?M1865 y y' & ?M1868 x' y'" with "ex2 (fun R : relation2 X Y => bisimulation R) (fun R0 : relation2 X Y => R0 R y)".

In environment A : Type H0 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), incl R R' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R' S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : X y : Y x : relation2 X Y H1 : x R y H : wexpansion1 TX TY x H2 : simulation TY TX (trans x) Unable to unify "forall a : A, evolve_1 ?M2359 ?M2360 (L a) (?M2361 ?M2363) (?M2361 ?M2364)" with "ex2 (fun R : relation2 X Y => bisimulation R) (fun R0 : relation2 X Y => R0 R y)".

In environment A : Type H4 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), incl R R' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R' S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S H3 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : X y : Y x : relation2 X Y H1 : x R y H : wexpansion1 TX TY x H2 : simulation TY TX (trans x) Unable to unify "{x : ?I & ?M3133 x}" with "ex2 (fun R : relation2 X Y => bisimulation R) (fun R0 : relation2 X Y => R0 R y)".

In environment A : Type H4 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), incl R R' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R' S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S H3 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : X y : Y x : relation2 X Y H1 : x R y H : wexpansion1 TX TY x H2 : simulation TY TX (trans x) Unable to unify "?U_ (ssrfun.tag2 ?M4685)" with "ex2 (fun R : relation2 X Y => bisimulation R) (fun R0 : relation2 X Y => R0 R y)".

In environment A : Type H5 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), incl R R' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R' S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S H0 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : X y : Y x : relation2 X Y H1 : x R y H : wexpansion1 TX TY x H2 : simulation TY TX (trans x) Unable to unify "?T_ (ssrfun.tag2 ?M5461)" with "ex2 (fun R : relation2 X Y => bisimulation R) (fun R0 : relation2 X Y => R0 R y)".

In environment A : Type H4 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), incl R R' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R' S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S H3 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : X y : Y x : relation2 X Y H1 : x R y H : wexpansion1 TX TY x H2 : simulation TY TX (trans x) Unable to unify "forall a : A, evolve_1 ?M6239 ?M6240 (L a) (?M6241 ?M6243) (?M6241 ?M6244)" with "ex2 (fun R : relation2 X Y => bisimulation R) (fun R0 : relation2 X Y => R0 R y)".

In environment A : Type H6 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), wmonotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) H5 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), incl R R' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R' S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S H0 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : X y : Y x : relation2 X Y H1 : x R y H : wexpansion1 TX TY x H2 : simulation TY TX (trans x) Unable to unify "monotonic ?M7351 ?M7352 ?M7353" with "ex2 (fun R : relation2 X Y => bisimulation R) (fun R0 : relation2 X Y => R0 R y)".

In environment A : Type H8 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), wmonotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) H7 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), incl R R' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R' S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S H4 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) H3 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), increasing F -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> monotonic TX TY F X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : X y : Y x : relation2 X Y H1 : x R y H : wexpansion1 TX TY x H2 : simulation TY TX (trans x) Unable to unify "forall R S : relation2 ?M8685 ?M8686, incl R S -> incl (?M8689 R) (?M8689 S)" with "ex2 (fun R : relation2 X Y => bisimulation R) (fun R0 : relation2 X Y => R0 R y)".

In environment A : Type H10 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), wmonotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) H9 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), incl R R' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R' S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S H6 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) H5 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), increasing F -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> monotonic TX TY F H0 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> increasing F X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : X y : Y x : relation2 X Y H1 : x R y H : wexpansion1 TX TY x H2 : simulation TY TX (trans x) Unable to unify "forall (x x' : ?M10189) (y : ?M10190), ?M10191 ?M10193 x x' -> ?M10194 x y -> exists2 y' : ?M10190, Weak ?M10192 ?M10193 y y' & ?M10196 x' y'" with "ex2 (fun R : relation2 X Y => bisimulation R) (fun R0 : relation2 X Y => R0 R y)".

In environment A : Type H11 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), wmonotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) H8 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), incl R R' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R' S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S H7 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) H4 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), increasing F -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> monotonic TX TY F H3 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> increasing F X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : X y : Y x : relation2 X Y H1 : x R y H : wexpansion1 TX TY x H2 : simulation TY TX (trans x) Unable to unify "forall (x x' : ?M11693) (y : ?M11694), ?M11695 (T A) x x' -> ?M11697 ?M11699 x y -> exists2 y' : ?M11694, Weak ?M11696 (T A) y y' & ?M11697 ?M11700 x' y'" with "ex2 (fun R : relation2 X Y => bisimulation R) (fun R0 : relation2 X Y => R0 R y)".

In environment A : Type H12 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), wmonotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) H10 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), incl R R' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R' S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S H9 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) H6 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), increasing F -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> monotonic TX TY F H5 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S) H0 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> increasing F X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : X y : Y x : relation2 X Y H1 : x R y H : wexpansion1 TX TY x H2 : simulation TY TX (trans x) Unable to unify "Prop" with "bisim R y".

original: intros R. induction R. - apply incl_evolve. auto. apply mon_a; auto. - apply ssrfun.Tagged. intros w. destruct R as [| w _]. + apply ssrfun.tagged2'. + apply ssrfun.tagged2. - apply wmon_a; auto. - apply mkmon; auto. * apply mon_m. auto. * apply incl_evolve. auto. apply mon_t; auto. - apply wexpand.
